name: @motiadev/core
description: Core functionality for the Motia framework, providing the foundation for building event-driven workflows.

scripts.python-setup: python -m venv python_modules && python_modules\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.move:python: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');fs.mkdirSync('dist/src/python',{recursive:true});try{fs.readdirSync('src/python').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.py')).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join('src/python',f),path.join('dist/src/python',f)))}catch(e){console.log('No Python files to copy')}"
scripts.move:rb: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');fs.mkdirSync('dist/src/ruby',{recursive:true});try{fs.readdirSync('src/ruby').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.rb')).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join('src/ruby',f),path.join('dist/src/ruby',f)))}catch(e){console.log('No Ruby files to copy')}"
scripts.move:steps: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');try{fs.readdirSync('src/steps').filter(f=>f.endsWith('.ts')).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join('src/steps',f),path.join('dist/src/steps',f)))}catch(e){console.log('No step files to copy')}"
scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('dist'))fs.rmSync('dist',{recursive:true,force:true})" && tsc && npm run move:python && npm run move:rb && npm run move:steps
